subtasks.title: Implement provider detection from baseUrl (Anthropic, z.ai, ZHIPU)
Implement usage endpoint routing based on provider type
Implement response normalization for z.ai quota/limit endpoint
Implement response normalization for ZHIPU quota/limit endpoint
Implement authentication handling for API profiles (apiKey vs OAuth token)

issues_fixed.title: Usage values not displaying correctly for z.ai and ZHIPU providers
issues_fixed.description: Changed from model-usage endpoint to quota/limit endpoint and updated response parsing to extract limits array
